statements: SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalActivities;
SELECT activity_id, location, waste_type FROM WasteDisposalActivities WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalActivities ORDER BY disposal_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalActivities WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteDisposalActivities GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalActivities WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY disposal_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT activity_id, location, quantity FROM WasteDisposalActivities WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM WasteDisposalActivities GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalActivities WHERE disposal_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM WasteDisposalActivities
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT site_name, location, status FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT site_name, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM waste_disposal_sites JOIN disposal_records ON waste_disposal_sites.site_id = disposal_records.site_id GROUP BY site_name;
SELECT site_id, disposal_date, disposal_time, waste_type, weight FROM disposal_records ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, disposal_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE site_name LIKE '%Recycling%' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT d.record_id, d.disposal_date, d.waste_type, s.site_name FROM disposal_records d JOIN waste_disposal_sites s ON d.site_id = s.site_id ORDER BY d.disposal_date DESC;
SELECT site_id, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM disposal_records GROUP BY site_id HAVING total_weight > 1000;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, truck_id, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteCollection;
SELECT * FROM WasteTreatment WHERE treatment_type = 'Incineration';
SELECT collection_date, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteCollection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_date, location, disposal_method FROM WasteDisposal WHERE waste_quantity > 100;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_date, facility_id, treatment_type FROM WasteTreatment ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT collection_date, truck_id, quantity FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT waste_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteCollection GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT * FROM WasteTreatment WHERE treatment_type = 'Recycling' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT disposal_id, location FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' AND waste_quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE waste_type='Plastic';
SELECT site_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM waste_collection_sites JOIN waste_collection_logs ON waste_collection_sites.site_id = waste_collection_logs.site_id GROUP BY site_name;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_logs ORDER BY collection_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT team_name, vehicle_number FROM waste_collection_teams JOIN waste_collection_vehicles ON waste_collection_teams.vehicle_id = waste_collection_vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE vehicle_type='Truck';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT site_name, location, waste_type FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE site_id > 5 ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_name, SUM(collected_weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_collection_sites JOIN waste_collection_logs ON waste_collection_sites.site_id = waste_collection_logs.site_id GROUP BY site_name;

SELECT team_name, vehicle_number, vehicle_type FROM waste_collection_teams JOIN waste_collection_vehicles ON waste_collection_teams.vehicle_id = waste_collection_vehicles.vehicle_id ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM WasteBins;
SELECT location, capacity FROM WasteBins WHERE current_level < 50;
SELECT waste_name, description FROM WasteTypes;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM WasteDisposalRoute WHERE start_location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM WasteBins WHERE current_level > 50 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT bin_id, location, current_level FROM WasteBins WHERE location LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY bin_id ASC;
SELECT collection_date, collected_amount, w.waste_name FROM WasteCollection c JOIN WasteTypes w ON c.waste_type_id = w.waste_type_id WHERE collected_amount > 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM WasteDisposalRoute WHERE start_location = 'Warehouse A' OR end_location = 'Warehouse B' ORDER BY route_id;

SELECT m.log_id, c.collection_date, r.route_name FROM MonitoringLogs m JOIN WasteCollection c ON m.collection_id = c.collection_id JOIN WasteDisposalRoute r ON m.route_id = r.route_id WHERE c.collected_amount < 50 ORDER BY c.collection_date ASC;
